title: Fun Ways to Pep Up Your Marriage
itunes:author: Guest: Kathi Lipp
itunes:summary:
Author Kathi Lipp offers practical, fun ideas for couples to improve their relationship and make time together a high priority.


Receive the book "Happy Habits for Every Couple" and the audio download of the broadcast "Fun Ways to Pep Up Your Marriage" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-09-26?refcd=1488513


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/fun-ways-to-pep-up-your-marriage/#featured-resource-cta


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
